item.title: Rasterization basic
item.description: Scan line VS half-space Scan line goes from the top of the triangle and follows the edges until the bottom vertex is reached. Half-space tests each pixel against the triangle edge planes. If a pixel is inside all 3 planes, it is covered by the triangle.
